title: Purpose of this type of artwork

content.description:
Snark/ Art Resource, NY

Poster from the Seventeenth Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, 1934.

Poster text: “Raise the Flag of Lenin, It Gives Us Victory!”

Banners at bottom read: “Long live the invincible party of Lenin!” “Long live the great guide of the international proletarian revolution, Comrade Stalin!”
content.question: Artworks of the type shown in the image were used for all of the following EXCEPT to

choices.label: mobilize the Soviet population in support of the policy of “total war” during the Second World War
showcase Soviet support for the Warsaw Pact during the Cold War
promote Soviet support for anti-imperialist independence movements in Asia and Africa
encourage Soviet citizens to embrace Western popular culture

content.answer: encourage Soviet citizens to embrace Western popular culture
